website_summaries.verdict: An affordable clip-on light that can be affixed to your headboard or night table.
pros: A highly adjustable design makes it easy to shine light in whatever direction you desire
Users can choose between warm and white light and 2 brightness settings
Light can also be powered via USB
cons: Dim setting isn't bright enough to be useful according to some users

website_summaries.verdict: A small but useful, adjustable and affordable lamp that clips right to your headboard.
pros: Can handle over 2" width on your headboard
LED light can last a long time
Lamp doesn't take up much space
Flexible neck helps you put the light where you need it without disturbing a bed partner
Neck is stiff enough to stay in place
cons: The white light on this light might not be as bright as you expect and could be difficult to use for reading

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Small Sturdy Reading Lamp (with large clamp)
customer_reviews.text: This light is perfect. I needed a reading light that didn't take up much space and most importantly the clamp had to be wide enough to grip my thick wood bed frame. I was relieved when it came and I found the clamp easily fit. The light has I think two settings? The blue is soothing, the white I use most because it puts off good reading light. I should also add the metal neck that bends is sturdy and firm yet flexible. Better quality than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: An Unexpected Pleasant Surprise
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting much of this product. I just needed a lamp beside my bed that didn't need to be on my night stand. I decided to get this because it looked like what I needed. I am very pleasantly surprised. The neck part that moves around is very sturdy and not flimsy. The clip works very well and does not slide off. And the light part is not hot to the touch. I didn't know that would not be hot so I was happy. The light is bright, too, to read in the dark. I would buy this again. I rarely write reviews, but this purchase I was really happy with.
customer_reviews.author: RVProdi

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and bright. I was worried that the light would be yellow like a typical incandescent bulb, but it can actually switch to a very pure white. The two light levels are very different and can be used for reading or as a night light. The neck is very sturdy and can hold its shape with a very dense mini pumpkin on top. Great buy and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Fan

customer_reviews.title: Clips Opens Up to Fit on 2x4 ➙ Varied Brightness a Plus
customer_reviews.text: I received this item as a free sample. The following review is my honest and unbiased opinion: My video pretty much says it all about this light. It pretty much does everything we want it to do as a reading light: ➙ it clips onto our 2x4 built-in ➙ the light itself moves around on the arm, so you can aim the light ➙ it has bright and dim settings ➙ and it has yellow and clean white LED light quality I think it's a nice reading light, too, because of the plastic diffuser that spreads out the light a bit, creating a warm yet bright glow.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Good niche lamp
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these inexpensive little lamps and they are better than I expected. Got the silver because they are all metal-no plastic and they look good and work well at four light settings (yellow and white light, high and low). Also, so far they stay put as we adjust the arms and the pivoting lamp heads. We put them on our headboard and now can read while the other sleeps with no light in our eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Davvero

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp after having my daughter because I'm breast feeding and it took so much effort to get up and turn on the light at night, not to mention the hard light would wake her up, making it harder to put her back to sleep. I also would often wake my husband up. This lamp made all of our lives easier. Very handy and love how it has different settings to either make the light super strong or lighter. Love this lamp and recommended!
customer_reviews.author: michael maldonad o

customer_reviews.title: I liked it originally
customer_reviews.text: I liked it originally. I used it on my bed frame for reading. I have a USB outlet, so it was great to be able to plug it into that. I used the dim soft setting. Four months later the soft light stopped working. Now I have to read with the white light, which is OK, but not what I prefer. I'm unsure why a light would have way work. UPDATE: I contacted the vendor through Amazon and they promptly sent me a replacement. It's always good when a vendor is responsive and backs their product!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa VonTess

customer_reviews.title: Nice little lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to light one of my turntables. It is a great light source for checking the cleanliness of my records prior to playing them. Being able to switch from a white light to a warmer temperature light is nice. The lamps dimmability is good for when I want less ambient light. The clip is strong and the adjustability of the stem are both pluses. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M. Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Purchase For My Needs.
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and bought this to clip onto my computer monitor. It's exactly what I wanted. I can aim the light directly onto the keyboard and paperwork in front of me. The angle is easy to adjust, I can use the light on different settings though I tend to use it at its brightest, it's unobtrusive (my office furniture and decor is antique) and I don't have to light up the whole room on a slightly cloudy day just to see what's in front of me on my desk. The clip is very strong and sturdy and I have no worries about this shifting or sliding. Ideal purchase for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Roogs

customer_reviews.title: Great light, terrible durability
customer_reviews.text: Edit 12/2/2017: The company made good on their comment and sent me a new light. Unfortunately that one had a problem too. The light would not stay consistently bright and would flicker. They sent a 3rd one and it has been fine. So it is a great light, but it took 3 before I got one that worked, so... your mileage may vary. This light was great until it stopped working last night. It has probably been used 10 times in the last 2 months since I bought it. Really disappointed because it was a great light.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler D. Rencher

customer_reviews.title: Hoping that someone sees this review and helps me out ...
customer_reviews.text: Hoping that someone sees this review and helps me out. This was delivered in late January. Barely a month and a half later. The light stopped working. It’s been clipped to the same spot the entire time and never treated roughly. Upon closer examination, the wire has become detached from the light housing. Hoping this is a defect with just mine.
customer_reviews.author: Keith G.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap USB style plug
customer_reviews.text: At first it was a decent light, good settings for day and night and two intensity settings. The clamp is very strong and will hold onto most desks and ledges well. I was a little taken back by its size, I had thought it was something you could use at night by clipping onto a head board, but it is much too large for that. The one star is from the USB plug that goes into a standard converter wall plug. The USB part completely snapped in half from light tension on the cord that stretched from the plug to the location I clipped it on. The USB style ending cannot be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: E. Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Great value, many uses.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two units for multi-seasonal window display, probably not a common use. Will work well for Halloween and Christmas. The flexible gooseneck is a good length, the head is not too large, and the clamp is very strong and well made. The many features are great, and I use both differently. One is set to high power, the other low. One is set for the "blue" LED light, the other for the more natural, yellow tungsten light. With two power options, USB and the included AC adapter, the only option you do not have is batteries. There should be a lot of uses for this light. EXCELLENT VALUE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This item is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This item is wonderful! I love how it has two options for Bright Light or Soft light. PLUS: Has a Dimmer! Just too AWESOME! Also, the Lamp turns all the way around, for Great angles! However the BEST thing, it has, is an option to use USB or Electric, to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioning within a week
customer_reviews.text: This product was great... until it stopped working completely. As you can see from the video, it started malfunctioning and now just flashes on any setting, white or soft light, bright or dim. Before it stopped functioning, it was great. I just wish it would’ve lasted longer than a single week.
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cord leads to broken light
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 3 days. The USB plug is extremely cheaply constructed. Someone gently tugged on the cord and the cord tore right out of its base, causing irreparable damage. The cord is directly connected to the lamp and therefore not replaceable if it breaks. This product appears to have substandard quality in the cord itself and the adapter. Very light and lacking any durability. I therefore can’t recommend the light itself.
customer_reviews.author: CNJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small light to clip on frame of bed. This is perfect. The bright/dim option is a plus. If I am reading it does not disturb my sleeping husband (or dogs!). The adjustable neck is a plus too. I can move the light closer or farther away just by adjusting the neck & not have to move the whole lamp. It sits next to my edge, so it is very easy to change position & lighting. There are 4 brightness levels to choose from. If you are after an adjustable light ... you should try this. It didn't disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Good little light
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids so they could read at night without having the overhead light on. I like these because they clip to their IKEA headboards, which are nearly 2-inches thick. My kids like that they can control where the light goes, and control the amount of light and whether it's amber or white. (One kids prefers dimmer amber light; the other kid likes bright white light.) I like that they can have their lights on while sharing a room without keeping each other awake all night.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith L.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: I have a single star because it arrived the the switch was completely broken, probably a mechanical assembly that was misaligned so all the screw holes were broken off. It should have been Cauthen places in box. The light itself is good.
customer_reviews.author: Tulie

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Review
customer_reviews.text: This light is not very bright, but I ordered a second one anyway. The first one I attached to my bandsaw to light up my work, and it's fine for that. The second one I used as a bedside reading light, and it's not really bright enough...I have to position it about 18" from my book to get enough light to comfortably read. The lamp is well made and the clip is strong.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. Excellent value for the price. I am a photographer and wanted a lower cost way to highlight some of my large images. I also loved the option to switch from a cool to warm white balance. Very flexible neck to be able to point to the spot on the canvas print. I've attached a photo taken with my phone of how I used one of these to highlight the sun setting in the image. Obviously it can also be used for a desk lamp but I am impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle

customer_reviews.title: Great adjustable lamp!
customer_reviews.text: awesome light. we have it under a loft bed and have just ordered another for the top bunk. love the two levels of light, easy to use, doesn't get hot to the touch. it comes with a soft pad to put under the clip so it doesn't damage whatever you at attaching it to. feels secure and the adjustable neck holds well in position. super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ellibot

customer_reviews.title: Neck does not hold position well.
customer_reviews.text: I own two of these lamps. The first one was excellent. My oldest son used it multiple times a week. It was so good I bought another one as a birthday present for my youngest son. The new lamp neck does not hold it's position like my old one. Because it was a birthday present, it sat in a box for a month before we had the party. I didn't know it was defective until the return window closed. It's still usable but it's not the same quality as the one several years old. I would give this a 5 star review if both lamps worked well.
customer_reviews.author: A Busch

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect! Clipped it to my headboard to read in ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! Clipped it to my headboard to read in bed. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: A. G. Tant

customer_reviews.title: Love how it fits fine in between the spacing on ...
customer_reviews.text: Love how it fits fine in between the spacing on the bed frame as well as the 2 settings that has an additional 2 settings after you make your selection
customer_reviews.author: Psiri

customer_reviews.title: FAILED  - rarely used and light flashes like a strobe
customer_reviews.text: Pleased at first. Used no more than 10 times in guest room. Then discovered light stopped working, only flashing like a strobe. Almost threw it out with the trash but saw another review here with same problem and mentioned trouble with the power adapter. I rechecked the reading light by plugging it into a different USB power bank and the light works. Using the one supplied causes the light to strobe on any setting. So I guess I'll have to buy a usb power supply to use this in my guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Piperelliott

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken open with wires sticking out
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken with wires hanging out. The shipping envelope and box it came in were immaculate so it cannot imagine it happened during shipping. Opened the box and the section with the switch was broken wide open with damaged wires sticking out. It looks as though a very visibly broken lamp was packed that way and then shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Tye

customer_reviews.title: Light started flickering after less than one month
customer_reviews.text: I've had this lamp for less than a month, using it less than 30 minutes a day. It has already started flickering, which is very distracting and annoying. I love the other functionally of the lamp but cant stand the flickering.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in brightness altho very cute light
customer_reviews.text: I like the clip on feature of this light and I like the 3 way switch on the cord that lets you change the tone of the light but I am so very disappointed with the brightness of it. I was expecting the light to be much brighter than it is. I have small flashlights brighter than this light. I was expecting to be able to read by this light which i cant do. Its more like a night light than a reading light. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Smith

customer_reviews.title: THIS LED CLAMP LAMP IS GREAT. Clamp is STRONG (watch your fingers : )
customer_reviews.text: THIS LED CLAMP LAMP IS GREAT. Clamp is STRONG, light settings for any taste, LEDs do not generate heat, whole appearance is elegant/sophisticated. We are IN LOVE with this product. A #1 SOLUTION. Two of us do not have room for night tables, could not read in bed without turning on ceiling light bulbs and make the other person uncomfortable. Looked at cheap clamp lamps from hardware store: Plastic, weak clamp, would fall off head board. Large bulb would generate heat next to our heads. But this LEPOWER lamp is allowing me to READ my books in bed again and put away the darn phone. Woohoo! : )
customer_reviews.author: delgadojc2

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality of this product. I bought 3 in order to clip on the top of the shelves/hutches that go with my desk. I wish they were a touch brighter but I am using them in a way that they weren’t really designed yo be used. I have no doubt they would be plenty bright using them as a reading light clipped onto a headboard for example. They look very nice and the feel sturdy and of excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: TNFurb

customer_reviews.title: Flickers. USB fits loosely into the wall-plug component
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this for my mother, for reading in bed. The high and low light is awesome. It's also nice that the switch control is close enough to the lamp to reach it while in bed. However I Purchased this today and the USB plug does not fit snugly into the component for the wall outlet. It's loose and the light flickers. I would give this a one star except I really do like the light and the clamp. The clamp does have the 2.3" dimension stated. It is made with a strong spring and seemingly durable metal. Clamp is also well padded. I'm so disappointed but a flickering light because of loose attachment is not good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Bernoulli

customer_reviews.title: Overheated and burned my child
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a reading lamp for my son. Tonight, he went to adjust it and it burned his hand, leaving a red mark. When we looked at the lamp, the plastic cover had melted and curled. The lamp was hot down the bendable stem as well. I'm glad my son wasn't more severely injured, and that we removed the lamp from his room before it started a fire.
customer_reviews.author: Stinky

customer_reviews.title: Good for reading in bed when set on high, or a nightlight when pointed up and on low setting.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to read in bed. The light is bright enough for easy reading. The only disadvantage was the downward spillover of light from above. I fixed this by cutting a plastic to go cup into a little shade that kept the light focused to the front and kept it from going downward, picture a little upside down visor. This is only a problem because I read laying flat. If you are reading in a semi upright position, propped up on pillows, with the light behind you, this will not be a problem. The gooseneck is easily adjustable. If you get too rough with it, the clamp will slip around a little. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: john p. blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Very good light for 18 months
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with it until it started oscillating in brightness to a degree that it was too annoying to use. Giving it three stars because I used it daily for a year and a half before it went south.
customer_reviews.author: Jay G

customer_reviews.title: The other has a bad connection between the power cord and the USB plug
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these, one for each child. One of them works as promised. The other has a bad connection between the power cord and the USB plug. Cheap connection/overmold. It works sometimes, but not consistently. Try explaining that to a 4-year-old. Out of five stars, one gets a five and the other a 1, so I guess that averages out to 3 stars. I'm an engineer, and I've imported stuff from China. Quality control counts, LePower needs to work on that.
customer_reviews.author: Dress

customer_reviews.title: So far so good ...
customer_reviews.text: I received it today (9/24/2020), and attached to my computer desk. So far, it is great. Two different Kelvin settings with two brightness options. Instead of the included AC/USB adaptor [5V-0.5A] which is big, I am using an old Mac adaptor [5V-1A] which is much smaller. (Both are working equally well.) By the way, you may connect it to your PC USB2 or USB3 plug as they produce 5V 0.5A and 5V 0.9A, respectively. It seems the lamp requires 5V and at least 0.5A. I hope the arm is a bit longer. Some people may find the the length of the electric cable is short.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Weak Neck
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light almost a year ago. I use it for making papercrafts. The lights work great, I love the brightness you can pick. And its got a detachable use plug. But its downfall for me is just after a year of normal use, the neck stop bending or supporting itself. It will not hold itself up anymore, I can't use it how I need anymore. I have to bend it all different angles anymore without it drooping. I love this light otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Tindall

customer_reviews.title: Item stopped working... would go on if ...
customer_reviews.text: Item stopped working...would go on if only in a certain position...I am guessing the wiring inside deteriated by my moving the lamp in position...or broke..not the bulb burning out...very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Light stopped working after only a few cumulative hours of use
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product since the clip had a good trip and the ability to change the lamp's orientation seemed useful. However, recently the light no longer turns on. I've only used the lamp for a few hours cumulatively, so if the bulb is already dead, then that's disappointing. Based on how it stopped working though, it almost seems like something went wrong with the cord, because it stopped working when I adjusted the neck of the lamp. (I did not use any extreme force or angles.) Overall, a waste of money, and I am unfortunately past my return window.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: i was looking for something to provide a little extra light while I am reading. This didn't do it. Problems: - I didn't like the amount /quality of the light it projected - I found it really difficult to adjust the arm to direct the light where I needed - I found the cord to be on the short side for attaching to both an outlet and a piece of furniture - I found being tethered to an outlet limiting for an item that, ultimately, I wanted to to be as mobile as my book. In summary, I returned it and found true love and happiness with Glucosent next reading LED light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am a senior citizen who likes to do close needlework. As we age, eyesight is not as it was when we are younger. This device is lightweight, clips on to the edge of the end table where I sit, providing a directed, sharp, high quality light focused on my work area. The light does not generate heat toward my hands. I like the fact that I can put it in place when desired and put away otherwise. It is lightweight, and had a very low price point. Thank you manufacturer and vendor...excellent product, ideal for close work, and a great price point!
customer_reviews.author: pookie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 3D printer task light!
customer_reviews.text: Love the huge, strong clip. Bright light, with strong gooseneck that stays in place once bent. I'm using mine as a task light for my 3D printer. Given the large jaws and strong clip on this light, it should clip to just about any 3D printer frame or the table it sits on. Interesting that the power supply is really a USB wall wart (5v 500ma). I may eliminate the wall wart and just plug it into an existing multi-port charging station. Strong light without being blinding. Easily pointed to focus all the light on the area you want.
customer_reviews.author: sipy

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon arrival - poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two for my twin girls beds, to clip on the headboards. Well, I received the two lamps, opened them up, and the cover to the electrical housing fell into my hand. On BOTH lamps. I'm just taking a guess, but it appears that the screws are too short OR the posts into which the screws go - are too thin. And they snapped off. Don't waste your money, go for a different brand and pay a few more dollars. They felt pretty solid and heavy, but that switch was very poor quality. I'm returning, and already purchased another two lamps, different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Cwilson

customer_reviews.title: Lots of options for lights
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good light. It has the option of bright or low light for both blue colored light or warm colored light. So for bed time reading it is nice to have the option of warm colored lighting to not strain the eyes. It has a long cord too. It DOES sometimes pop off my son's bed frame but he does have a VERY thick bed frame which I knew would be a problem for any light we purchased. Overall tho, it does stay on unless its hit hard, and does not damage the wood. It also is very versatile w/the bendable neck.
customer_reviews.author: Cree Cree

customer_reviews.title: Great option if you are mounting as pictured
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these lights for my boys to have nighttime reading lights on their beds. Due to the frames we have, we needed to mount the clap vertically on a metal post, instead of a shelf as pictured. The arm i snot really strong enough to hold up the light in this orientation. We had to balance the light around and curve it just right to stay in place. The light is great and we will be keeping them, but know that if you need to mount it to a vertical surface, you may want to make sure you are not needing the entire 15" of height.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect light for most uses!
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy 3 more after using the first one for months. I needed them more places, this light is great, it gives options of 'warm' or 'cold' light (not actual temps, the light is cool to the touch), plus high or low levels of both. The clip is really strong and resilient and had held up to my unconventional bookshelf usage and constant adjustments. No complaints whatsoever other than maybe a wish the neck was a teeny bit longer, but that is a preference not a complaint.
customer_reviews.author: S. Archambeault

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little tool
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I work from home and my day starts at 6 am when it’s still dark. My work station is in a nook in our bedroom so I needed something that would light my area without disturbing my husband (who doesn’t have to be up until 8:30). This is perfect! I love the versatility of the low lighting (yellow) and LED lighting (white) and that you can choose a high or low level of intensity/brightness of the light. Great price and product. Gets the job done by giving me a well lit area to work without waking my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Mickens

customer_reviews.title: ok lamp
customer_reviews.text: I've had this lamp for a little over a year now and for the price, I'm satisfied. I use it as a reading lamp/desk light and for cosmetic needs. It's decently bright on the "high" setting but, for me, is much too dim to be of much use on "low". It is lightweight and twists in the way that I need it. One issue I have run into straight of out the box is that the connection to the USB AC adapted is loose and the light stutters when the cord is moved, so, a lot. For the price, this is a good little lamp for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: char1077

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't what I needed... but stilll worked out!
customer_reviews.text: I was actually looking for a clip on light that could be recharged, since it needs to clip to a moving hospital table. I got a little mixed up and ordered this one. I wound up using it somewhere else and still need to buy a light for that table. I haven't used it long enough to determine how long it lasts (will update if any issues). But I like the warm light on the highest setting over a file cabinet in a dark corner. The clip is strong. Doesn't seem to get really hot... but like I said, haven't used it much yet!
customer_reviews.author: echological

customer_reviews.title: awesome desk light
customer_reviews.text: I was in a tiny cubicle for clinic while in law school. I swear the overhead light did NOTHING to help and i finally broke down and bought this. it worked INCREDIBLY!!! it has different settings and features, which is cool. You can choose the type of light you're needing, which I really liked. It was lightweight and easy to install. I never had an issue with it staying clipped to the desk and it didn't leave any marks. I actually lent this to a student who is in clinic now to use and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: afran23

customer_reviews.title: Quirky controls but nicely made light.
customer_reviews.text: I use this as an office grow light. I am not sure that the intensity is good enough for plants but I am pleased with the function of this light otherwise. The cool light setting only works on/off but the warm light setting works dim/bright using the on/off switch, which is slightly weird to get used to but not inconvenient as the cool/warm switch also has an off function. If I actually used the cool light setting, having the dim function would be nice. The clip is strong and the gooseneck is rubberized and functions well.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Initially worked as expected. About 2.5 hours into using it, the power adaptor sparked and smoked with incredible burning and smelled. Pulled off the adapter which was hot! Replaced the power adapter with an Apple adapter (will try to unload a picture) then the light was working again. Will closely monitor through out the day and BE SURE RO TURN IT OFF if not able to attend. Would NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mulan

customer_reviews.title: Love the Variety in Lights but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I love the four light settings that this comes with but it could be stiffer. It's been several months and was only clamped to a bed for a few weeks and it just keeps kind of ... drooping down. I wish the bendable neck were a little stiffer and the clamp had a little more pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Little Light-Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This little light is PACKED WITH POWER!!! Sorry for the late review! I like this light so much, it's just what I needed to use on my new desk. The other nice features are that you can set it to different light options, say you just want a dimmer light? Then simply switch it to that option. It's very simple to use and it's sturdy which I like also. I clamped it on to my desk and I can move the light part while the base stays secure. Awesome product! Definitely recommend 👍
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: my boys love these!
customer_reviews.text: We got these for reading lamps for my boys beds. They are 10 and 12 and often stay up reading at bedtime. When one is reading and the other is trying to sleep, they use these lights. The light is bright enough to read by but not so bright that it disturbs the other child. I plan on getting a few more for my daughter, my husband, and for myself as well.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie W

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp well made two setting 😀
customer_reviews.text: So someone gifted me with a Chromebook. My big lamp was way too much. I immediately went onto Amazon and saw this little guy 😄. Perfect. It came so quick. I set it up in no time. It clipped onto my lap desk which I also purchased from Amazon. It has bright lights and soft lights so you are covered 😊. Well made. Price was right. It does everything a lamp should and then some. Life is short and even shorter if you are still reading this just please go ahead and buy this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Small, bright and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Bought this to highlight our Angel for our Christmas Tree. Clips on to tree base perfectly, coaxial cable enables precise placement, small thin black cover on back makes it nearly invisible and light tones and brightness settings allow creating just the right lighting. My prior light was battery powered, thus inconvenient. The AC capability is great. I'm sure the primary design uses are also well conceived but, this is a very versatile device. Would give it s 10 if possible!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Sundermeyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for reading!
customer_reviews.text: Really excited to have this light. I’ve been needing a light for reading while in bed. Im glad I chose this product. The brightness easily out shines the lamp I was using. Plus I’m able to position it behind me due to the arm. I like how our has two colors to choose from and two brightness levels. I definitely recommend for anyone looking for an affordable night light for reading. I also plan on taking it on camping trips since I can power it with my battery bank.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: It's alright
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is not bad, however in some modes it will flicker, which of course is really annoying. And I also think that the configuration of the buttons is awkward--it has one switch with two positions that sets the intensity to high or low, then another switch that has three positions that changes the light from cool white to warm white or to turn it off. I would have expected to find the "off" setting on the same switch as the high or low intensity, but whatever. Unintuitive design, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good Light!
customer_reviews.text: It's funny that my headboard looks exactly like the one pictured. The clip is attached exactly like the picture also. I really like it! You can bend and shape it any way you want, and the clip is strong! You can manipulate the brightness of the light which is great. Had I known about these, I would have bought one long ago. But I now know where I can get them if I need more. So far it works great, but after reading some of the reviews about the light getting hot, falling off, etc., so I hope it continues to work well. All in all, I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: bought 2
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2, it's thick enough to clamp on a 2x4 piece of lumber. Quite sturdy and flexible to where it needs to be. I like the low/high and warm/white settings. Everything a simple clamp on LED light should be. The cord is approx 6ft with a switch about 1ft from the clamp. USB plug in for power, at 1amp max=5 watts consumption. About 1 to 1.5 watt on low. Can be used with any usb-battery banks etc. Would buy more if I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Great OwlTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Nice brightness but moves too much
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok light. My son likes that there are multiple shades of light (basically 4 settings). Primary reason we bought this is because he transitioned to a loft bed and he needed a light to clip onto the frame so he could read. For whatever reason, the light just doesn’t stay where he wants it: either the grip on the clip eventually gives and moves or the flex-arm gives and he has to constantly rearrange the light to be able to read. Basically, it is constantly tipping over. I suppose it would do better on a frame that is not metal.
customer_reviews.author: W. G.

customer_reviews.title: Only good for horizontal clipping
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my daughter's dorm, and should have returned but I got home too late. It is inexpensive and does wind and maneuver nicely if you clip it to your desk or another flat surface. We needed to clip to rails on bunk bed. While it did clip it has no ability to hod it shape. It just falls down. So if you need it for anything that will put stress at the bottom of the lamp to change shapes, this won't work. You will only be able to shape the top.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C.

customer_reviews.title: Saving my eyes!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp! I use it for reading in a room that just isn't bright enough and for cross stitch. I love that it has a white light and a yellow light setting with two different brightness levels for each. Perfect for the different things I use it for. The clip is great because I can move it from my desk for reading to my cross stitch stand without any issue. Also adore that it's a USB. I use this lamp almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: All options you might need
customer_reviews.text: Does extremely well what is suppose to do, a combination of 4 options, 2 intensities for the lamp and, the most important, 2 shades of lights, one whitish, one yellowish, impossible not to be satisfied. I was giving 4 stars cause I think the switch is too big, even considering all the options, but I decided it would be unfair since excells what is suppose to do, so I kept the 5 but still think the switch should be re-designed.
customer_reviews.author: Wolmar

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it is and our needs!
customer_reviews.text: My son chose th is lamp to replace a more clunky desk lamp for bedside table. He likes it. It’s clipped in his bunk bed and that’s working out. He thinks it was a good $ value. He keeps it plugged in and doesn’t use cordless feature. User friendly, even for young kids. I think it would work well for sewing projects, too. We have only used it one week, but it seems durable. He’s not moving it a ton.
customer_reviews.author: bld424

customer_reviews.title: Great light, switch in awkward location.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this lamp for a couple of months now. We got it for my 4 year old’s IKEA bunk bed and it just barely clips. Overall I’ve been very pleased. It has four settings cool, warm and then a high or low setting for each. My only complaint is that the switch is located about a 1/3 of the way down the cord making it awkward to locate and use. I would prefer the switch to actually be on the light somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Beck

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart at ten months
customer_reviews.text: For ten months it worked great on a daily basis. Then the part where you turn it on and off and adjust the brightness started falling apart. It’s attached to my headboard for nighttime reading and not moved or pulled on. I taped the plastic case back together because just snapping it didn’t work but the wires are exposed. I expected it to last longer and will shop another company to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: DakotaTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Love the light settings
customer_reviews.text: I love that there is a dim, warm light for nighttime reading. It's just bright enough to illuminate over my face and book, but not so bright that it lights up the whole room. However, I think it's a bit flimsy, I don't expect the bendable arm to last more than a few months. The clamp could be tighter, and the power cord could me longer. I wish this great light setup came on a better frame.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Flexible, Sturdy and Bright
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is actually a better quality lamp than I expected. It is metallic, and the flexible neck and lamp head hold their shapes. So far, there is no drooping or sagging in positioning the lamp head or the neck. The clamp is all metal and has a tight spring, so it provides a sturdy grip on the edge of the table, desk, shelf, etc. The light is bright, making it perfect for reading or any task requiring attention to detail. A flip of a switch will reduce the brightness once, making the lamp perfect for ambient room lighting. I'm very pleased with this product, and I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen W. Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Bulb died after 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: It was nice while it lasted for 3 months. The soft light bulb is already out and not sure how long the other one will last. LED's are supposed to last much longer. Not sure if it's poor quality LED's or manufacturing flaw. I want a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Syed Azeem

customer_reviews.title: versatile little reading lamp
customer_reviews.text: This light was a pleasant surprise: quite well made, fairly heavy-duty in its base, and plenty bright enough for reading in bed. I have it clipped to my head board and it bends to just the right configuration to provide light while remaining out of the way. I use it often and seem to have no eye strain resulting from its use. Totally silent. Also very energy efficient at only 3 watts. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Blackbird

customer_reviews.title: A love/hate story: Both LEDs died!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this light. Great design, 2 light with different colors. 5 stars. The 1 just went dead. Ok, 3 stars. Now the second one is dead. The thing is now worthless and it is ONLY 4 months old. I’m so sad.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. D

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this exactly 2 weeks. My favorite light setting already stopped working. I only use it at night for about an hour. I wanted to give it an extra star for how it was when it did work. But I don’t feel that would be accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah *Smiles*

customer_reviews.title: Best Light!
customer_reviews.text: I love this light, I hook it on to my computer so I can see the keyboard at night and it has a very bright option or soft light. I like them both. It is easy to charge too. I bought another type and it broke real easy. This one I had about a year and it is still working great! I would buy this as a gift for someone or if this one ever breaks, I would buy another one. I tried all sorts of lights, this is the best one so far.
customer_reviews.author: Starlight Moonbeam

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, nice light!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this light! It's sturdy and well-made, and the flexible neck allows me to concentrate illumination anywhere I need it. I also love the choice of two brightnesses, one a soft, warm glow, and the other brighter and more like daylight. Also, the clip is outstanding... it has no trouble securely gripping a tabletop that is almost two inches thick. Also, the miniscule amount of electricity needed will save me money, since when working online at night, I no longer have to burn the expensive overhead lights.
customer_reviews.author: Tau Ceti Four

customer_reviews.title: High quality, not super bright
customer_reviews.text: High quality and very cool. Clamp is sturdy. Neck is strong and holds any flex. I removed one star because the light itself is not super bright on the high setting. This light is definitely best used as a night light and not for brightening a small work area during the day (for example, doing crafts at a desk.) The controls are simple to use. $15.99 is a fair price. I will still be looking for a bright desk light though.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Works as  advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one in lieu of the newer one because this one has mechanical on/of switches. That way if I am trying to turn the light on in the dark it's easier to feel the switches. Seems to work great. I have it over my desk for a keyboard light. It have two colors warm and cool and two levels of brightness. A large clamp for the size of the lamp. It is USB powered and this version came with an adapter.
customer_reviews.author: J. Madden

customer_reviews.title: Nice light for reading on bed
customer_reviews.text: The light is versatile enough and easy to be adjusted to be in the best position for reading on the bed. I bought this for my kid and he likes it. The LED tends to be a little warm at high brightness settings but I guess it is normal. I gave 4 stars because the first light delivered was damaged in the package. It might not be the fault of the product though. Amazon sent a replacement quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tmacyao

customer_reviews.title: Bit sad
customer_reviews.text: Last time I checked so many times, this was rechargeable it says. But then after I got it and read again, it was not rechargeable. Bought this cause I thought it was rechargeable, so when it came in, it brought a lot of trouble for me cause I never intended to have a plugged in clamp on my studio. It’s a nice lamp on its own, but I wish this is just rechargeable and not have to plug it in all the time. There’s also many reviews saying it would stop working after 1-2 weeks, so lemme see if it still works after that.
customer_reviews.author: Ferissa Mabalot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little clip utility light! Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little lamp! It was just what I was looking for! I like to crochet in bed, but the poor lighting in my room made it difficult to see the stitches. I have this clipped on my headboard and shine the light over my shoulder. It is very adjustable and the different brightness are great. I use the brightest when I'm working and it's pretty powerful! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rodenroth

customer_reviews.title: Dont like it and dead in a year
customer_reviews.text: It slips around too much if to try to adjust the head or neck you have hold bottom too. The covers over the clamps are not good and became stretched out quickly. Good idea to protect what surface you clamp too but cheap not good materials. Very stiff neck. The light comes unscrewed easily when adjusting too. It was always loose when plugged in and flashed and flickered if touched. It died in a year. Would I recommend or repurchase? No way
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M. Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile reading light
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a reading light for my son. The clip is mighty strong and holds fast without moving around. The fact we can choose the light output, from bright to low and "cool" to "warm" makes it that much easier on the eyes, especially in the dark. The 5V lamp works with any standard USB charger which any smartphone user already has a few scattered about the home anyway, so that's also convenient. The lamp does get a bit warm to the touch, but NOT hot which was a concern.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: clip on light
customer_reviews.text: I use this light at my diamond painting board. I need a little light on the drills to catch if they are in the right position. This light works perfectly. 2 choices, low or high, and an on/off switch on the cord. The metal wrapped snake neck easily adjusts and stays where it's pointed. I never hesitated to update my reviews should new information seem useful.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverYOUNGTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Great light, great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. I needed a bright light for my desk and it's perfect. It takes up almost no space clamped to the edge of my desk and it is bright enough for me to read the smallest print. It's easy to wiggle around to the position I want, and even the warm brightness is great for when I don't need it as bright. I plugged it into my USB port but it can also plug into an outlet. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp to clip onto my art board while painting/drawing. I'm quite satisfied with this little lamp. It has 4 light settings; yellow light (high and low) and white light (high and low). See video. The neck is very flexible and adjustable and stays where you twist it to. I can stand alone without being clipped to something but only if it is placed on a table that will not be bumped. The clip is sturdy metal and so far it stays put wherever I clip it. The cord is about 58 inches, just under 5 foot.
customer_reviews.author: SJM94010

customer_reviews.title: Defect in USB port
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the lamp stopped working after two months. The USB port had a defect and came apart after unplugging it from the wall (this was our first time unplugging it, it had been plugged into the same outlet for 2 months and when we had to move it, a part inside the USB port fell out). Beware of faulty parts. Worked great, until it didn’t. I ordered the same one a while back (6+ months) and it’s still going strong. Unfortunately we got a defect product this time around.
customer_reviews.author: AO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am using it as a 'night light' in the bedroom. My lamp is on the other side of the room and if I use the wall switch, it affects my clock and my adjustable bed! So this is clamped on to the tv stand when i walk into the bedroom. Simple to turn on and i didn't realize it had so many levels of light. It has a well-protected clamp so it will not harm or scratch whatever you clamp it to
customer_reviews.author: Pat J.

customer_reviews.title: This light has a very sturdy clip. I purchased this light actually for my ...
customer_reviews.text: This light has a very sturdy clip. I purchased this light actually for my stove. We don't have a light, so we clipped it to the hood vent and the lighting is fantastic. There are two types of light (white/natural). The natural lighting also has a bright and dim setting. So far, it works great. The neck is very maneuverable and the clarity of the light works well. Very happy with the purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: hitthepositive

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love the different light settings for which type of light i need and the different level settings of high and low, it's so perfect and goes with the bed-desk I bought! It's so easily adjustable and bendable and does not break!
customer_reviews.author: jessica Morris

customer_reviews.title: Well suited as a task light
customer_reviews.text: Just got it, so it's hard to say how I will like it in the long term. Initial impressions are good. I purchased it as a work light above a bench. I wanted its clamp to adapt to some range of supports and hold the lamp steady; that requirement seems to be satisfied. I wanted the gooseneck to be readily adjustable where needed; that requirement is satisfied. Multiple color temperatures were not in my list of requirements; they work fine, but are not important for my application.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Hood

customer_reviews.title: Many possible uses
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchase around five or six of these lights for both practical and decorative lighting. They are sturdy, provide white or warm light at high/low settings. The clip is quite strong. The weight is just a little too high to extend the lamp horizontally. This is the only time it falls off. I would also prefer a brighter high setting for closeup work. Otherwise, great.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Solid, great features, works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This light is super sturdy, and the clamp can open up very wide - which is great because my headboard is thick. Also, the light has two different modes with two brightness settings on each. It has a soft yellow light and a whiter LED type of light - and you can do dim or regular on each. That is a really nice feature. I use the dim setting on the yellow light and I can read with my wife laying right next to me without interrupting her sleep. If you want a reading light, buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua C. Mccormack

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little lamp
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little light.... it is easy to set up for doing crafts, it has two light types (bright white, and warm) and each of those have a high and low setting. Plus, I can use it plugged directly into an electric socket, or plug it into the usb port of my laptop. The gooseneck seems to have a really good range, and the whole light is very compact, and will be easy to store. Overall, for the money, this was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Babs in Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Good light, odd configuration
customer_reviews.text: Good light; good brighness to attach to a headboard for reading in bed. I like that you can switch the color temperature of the light too. I didn't give it 5 stars because the switches are ill-conceived. There's a 3-way switch and a 2-way switch. One would think the 2-way switch would control the 2 color choices, and the 3-way would be the brightness (off, low, high). Instead, the 3-way is off and the 2 colors, and the 2-way is low and high. It's just confusing, I guess. My kids (6 yrs old) still haven't quite figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: B.S.

customer_reviews.title: A Decent Light
customer_reviews.text: This is a very versitile light. The clamp is awesome--very strong and easily clamps tightly to a wide array of objects. The 4 light options are great. The only thing that disappointed me was that the brightest setting wasn't as bright as I needed. Therefore, I'm only giving it a four-star rating. But it's still a useful light for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: DAR

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp for my computer desk because it was situated in a dark corner and I hated having every light in the area on in order to get light to my desk. This light solved all my lighting issues. I especially like the option to have white or natural (yellowish) light along with two brightness settings for each. I took off the one star simply because the USB power cable was too short for how I wanted to mount it so I had to get and extension cable.
customer_reviews.author: Keith C Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Good Reading Lamp, But...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the same lamp in white first and liked it so much I decided to get this one in black for a different room. It is not the same lamp. This one has a coiled neck which does not hold its position when angled parallel to the floor. I wanted to use it on a headboard in that direction. The white lamp neck is smooth and holds position perfectly. I was able to find another use for it, so I'm not sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: BookLady

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light!!!
customer_reviews.text: My purchased just arrived today and I'm very pleased. I like the two light options. I prefer the fluorescent mode while reading. When I opened the box, I thought the lamp would be bigger, but as you can see it fits perfectly for my work space and it suit my purposes. Also, use it for my zoom meetings to properly light my face. Works just as good as any ring light.
customer_reviews.author: Blueknight
